drug.name: TAFA-93
drug.description: TAFA93 is a novel prodrug of the mTOR inhibitor rapamycin which has successfully completed Phase 1 clinical development. mTOR inhibitors are currently used in the prevention of organ rejection in transplantation, the treatment of autoimmune and oncological diseases, and as a component of coated stents for the treatment of coronary artery disease.
drug.mechanism-of-action: TAFA-93 has distinct mechanism of action than calcineurin inhibitors such as ISA247, Isotechnikaâ€™s lead drug. It has the pontential to be administered as a complementary therapy along with ISA247 in the prevention of organ rejection after transplantation.
